diff_hunk:
@@ -5538,6 +5538,19 @@ def test_abs(self):
         res = torch.LongTensor((-bignumber,))
         self.assertGreater(res.abs()[0], 0)
 
+    def test_hardshrink(self):
body:
We should delete the `hardshrink` in TH. After that, we can reuse the original hardshrink tests ([here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/28b592e00bcf7c1484964001817f1104e876e54c/test/test_nn.py#L5311-L5321)) so this new test is unneeded.

`test_nn`'s module tests have the ability to test on the CPU, CUDA, and do autograd tests
body_html:
